title: Detective Conan Movie 12: Full Score of Fear
title_jp: 名探偵コナン 戦慄の楽譜（フルスコア）
synopsis: Serial murders involving all kinds have happened. All the victims are from a Music School led by a famous pianist. Conan and company have been invited to a opening concert of the Music Hall built by the pianist. The biggest attraction of this concert is the world famous violin called "Stradivarius" and a special appearance of a singer who has perfect pitch.
